replies.message: He said in an interview that he never even saw Rihanna face to face while making the track.

Would you consider ever getting married again?

Are you close with Proofs family and his children?

Ever planning on doing a Rap song with your little brother Nate?

Is the blonde hair a permanent change or only for this current record?

Whats your favorite color?

Whats your favorite food?

Do you cook? If so, whats your favorite dish to cook?

What would you want engraved on your tombstone?

How do you feel about Macklemore and Ryan Lewis' work?

If you could live anywhere else but Detriot where would it be?  (If Detroit wasn't an option?)

Would you ever agree to do a freestyle rap battle with Kanye West or Jay Z?

Do you believe you have reached the pinnacle of your rapping technical skills?  Believe there is anymore to learn skill wise?

What are your top five favorite Eminem songs?

What's the most romantic thing you have ever done?

If you had to choose one CD to have on a stranded island which one would it be?

Hi Marshall fan from 2002 dude whats the most amazing is your production level glad to see this level more than reached on last lp to sum up a friend and i are producers its been almost 4 years in the making of our album we tried original things but the problem is that we wanted so many respected names we got me on records its so great we got plans for others but a guy from the game, then another one really fucked the project. The first one is no really bad deal. But the second one sold a lot of vocals from famous artists in fact without proper authorizations for publishing despite the promise. Its 50000 $+ invested the worse thing is the possibility my project to be shelved i paid and got most of these features just ask Cashis about me... The tracklist we made the music for and paid for the vocals :

01- It's Knoc Turn'al (Knoc Turn'al)
02- California OGs (Bad Azz, Soopafly, Kokane & Butch Cassidy)
03- OG Party (Daz Dillinger & Kurupt)
04- Time to die (D-Jukes)    SHELVED
05- Burning Hot (D-Jukes & Sophia May) SHELVED
06- Fill the glasses (D-Jukes, Sophia May & Aida) SHELVED
07- If I were to die (Steve-O & B-Real)
08- Dumb Idea (Steve-O & D-Jukes)
09- Take it to the crib remix (Cashis & Bishop Lamont)
10- Painful Discharge (Steve-O) SHELVED
11- Flawless (Homeland Security, Cashis & Young De)
12- U Beautiful (D-Jukes & Sophia May) SHELVED
13- Yolo (Jack Thriller, Sophia May & D-Jukes) SHELVED
14- TBA (D-Jukes & Ne-Yo) SHELVED
15- Close to Mine (Aida)
16- The Come Up (D-Jukes, Kobe Honeycutt & Lea Sunshine?) SHELVED
17- Insane (Bizarre & D-Jukes)
1/- We don't quit (Spleen)
Bonus Track : What's happening (Young Buck, Cashis & Spleen)

You or Paul MUST hear this project just PM and i can link the advance i put its almost done... i need help i dont know how i can make this project legit and go on...
what kind of question is this??? Show some respect yo.
